Introduction: Oh hi there. The name's Steve.#$b#New around here, I'm guessing?$3#$b#Don't worry too much - you'll get used to being to new person.$1

Tue: I've been thinking about getting back into football.#$b#Alex better play with me from time to time.$3#$b#Course I'll beat him.$1
Wed: Man, Alex is way too sporty.$h#$b#I mean, I consider myself a very athletic type, but there's a point when it's excessive.$2#$e#Have you seen how big his weights are?!$7

Fri: Thought you might want one of these.$h#$b# [138]#$b#I dunno. Been spending too much time with Willy.$6
Sat: Y'know, Evelyn's got me into these berry pies and I gotta say... they're delicious as hell.#$e#What? I have a thing for her cooking.
Sun: Why do I go to Marnie's ranch? I dunno, I like to keep an eye on Jas. She gets in trouble sometimes.$2#$e#
Fri8: Hey farmer! Wanna go out for dinner one night?$6#$e#Only if you want to - of course.$3
Mon2: Oh hey! Nice to see you.$3#$e#
Thu2: One day, I'm gonna get you to try and lift one of ALex's weights.

danceRejection: I'm not sticking around for the dance. Sorry. Maybe next time.#$e#It's not my fault I was born with two left feet.#$e#Okay don't rub it in.$2
divorced: Please just leave me alone. I don't wanna talk.$s#$b#Why don't I wanna talk? Take a WILD guess.$s#$e#STILL don't understand? How thick are you?$5
dumped_Guys: Hi. Hmm? What do you want?$s#$b#
secondChange_Guys: Are you sure you really want to be with me again? I know I'm not sure.$s#$b#It's a big decision.

Wed2: Hey there @! How's your day going?#$e#Well, I can see you're busy so you can go now if you want.$3
Fri2: I once saw this show about this boy and girl#$e#Yes it was a rom-com$3#$e#And anyways, I was just thinking about showing it to you.
Sat2: Do you still work at the farm on weekends? I mean man, do you at least get paid for it?$7
Sun2: Evelyn cooked up a roast dinner for today. If you want I can save you some.#$e#She doesn't do it often.
Mon4: Hey! I didn't know if I was gonna get chance to catch you today!$1#$e#I wanted to talk to you about something -#$e#But acutally, now that I think of it maybe now is not the best time.$4

Wed4: You look pretty happy today! Something good happen?$1
Thu4: Does Hailey ever talk about Alex? I'm not asking for me by the way.
Sat4: Do you know where the nearest phone is? I need to call someone.$2#$e#I've been needing to call them for a while.$2
Sun4: I'm not in the mood today, @.$5
Mon6: I like it here a lot.$1#$e#...But it's not home.$2#$e#God, I wish it was.$2
Tue6: Dust- @! Hey! For a sec I thought you were someone else. Haha.$1#$e#...Ha.
Wed6: I know it's really not my place, but maybe someone should watch over Vincent more.#$e#I mean that kid just wanders around wherever.#$e#Maybe I should talk to his mom.$1
Thu6: Don't think I didn't just see you nearly fall just then.$4#$e#In love.$6#$e#WITH ME!$6#$e#HAHA! Just messing with ya. *chuckles*.$1

Sat6: *on phone call* He did WHAT? Oh don't you worry Jodi, I'll make sure he-$7#$e#HUH? What? @?! Oh - one sec.$5#$e#*hangs up call* Can I help you?$9
Sun6: I played a match of football with Alex earlier.$2#$e#He won.$2#$e#I swear he cheated.$2
Mon8: I will take a flaming bullet that's been doused in radiation and spat out of a volcano for you.$5#$e#I'm serious.$5
Tue8: I saved Jas from choking earlier. Honestly.$5#$e#Vincent had convinced her that the wrapping on candies was edible.$5#$e#And I shouted a bad word because I was panicking, naturally.$5#$e#AND SHE COPIED ME!$7
Wed8: Marnie loves to tell me I'm great with kids. You know what she said?$1#$e#She said I make a great mom.$5#$e#A mom.$5#$e#DO I LOOK LIKE I HAVE MOM HAIR? And I'm a BOY - I mean, a MAN.$5#$e#I'm a MAN.$5
Thu8: You know something? You know what I did yesterday?$5#$e#I told my friend all about you.$5#$e#You'll have to meet him at some point - he doesn't beleive me about you.$5#$e#Oh his name? He's called Dustin.
summer_Mon: This atmosphere dries out my hair.$2

summer_Wed4: Alex is way too busy checking out Hailey than playing football with me.$5#$e#It's just annoying.$5

summer_Fri: Last summer was a blast.#$e#But hey, I bet this one can be pretty good too.
summer_Sat: My shoes literally stuck to the pavement it's so hot.$2

fall_Mon2: Marnie and Jodi are out, so I'm looking after Vincent and Jas.#$e#Do I get paid? Uh- sure. Yep. That's why I do it. Mhm. Yep.$3

fall_Fri2: Could you help me out with something?
